kuwetexserver

Class DataBank

  • java.lang.Object
    • kuwetexserver.DataBank

  • public class DataBank
extends java.lang.Object
    The class holds all the information about cats attributes, illnesses and litter box uses history.

        public void addNewRecord(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String eyes,
                java.lang.String weight,
                long time,
                java.lang.String health)
        Adds new record to the list of cats' data.
        Parameters:
        name - - name of the cat.
        eyes - - eyes color of the cat.
        weight - - current cat weight (kg).
        time - - the time of last defecation.
        health - - health status of the cat.

        date - - date of the analysis
